forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West wind 8 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 62. West wind 17 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn begins to chase away the remnants of night, Downtown San Francisco greets the day with a flirtation of warmth hovering in the low fifties. The west wind carries a gentle whisper, rustling through the streets and hinting at the sun's imminent arrival. With the promise of a sunlit afternoon, temperatures are expected to rise into the low sixties, coaxing the city’s vibrant life awake. The skies remain partly cloudy at this hour, a veil that will soon be parted to unveil a radiant, blue expanse.

A thin marine layer lingers near the coast, an ethereal presence that is both a guardian and an artist, softening the harsh edges of the skyline while enhancing the surrounding beauty. While the fog may dance around the outer reaches, obscuring the Golden Gate Bridge in whispers of gray, the heart of the city enjoys clarity, urging residents to venture outside. Optimal attire for the gentle briskness includes a light jacket with layers beneath—perfect for transitioning from the cool embrace of morning into the sunny warmth anticipated by midday. As the sun rises higher, this setting becomes ideal for a leisurely stroll through the parks, perhaps a visit to an understated café for a warm cup of coffee while soaking in the lively street scenes. In this serene yet spirited city, a simple walk can uncover hidden gems and local delights, revealing the pulse of life in all its complex beauty.
